firmament.carnival.tutorial.minesweeper: §eClick here to check out Firmaments Tutorial for this minigame!
firmament.command.waypoint.remove: Removed waypoint %s. Other waypoints may have different indexes now.
firmament.command.waypoint.remove.error: Could not find waypoint with that index to delete.
firmament.command.waypoint.skip.error: Could not skip a waypoint. Are you in ordered waypoint mode with waypoints loaded?
firmament.config.anniversary.pig-hud.des: A HUD showing rewards pulled from shiny pigs
Track rewards from shiny pigs, as well as how much time you have left to collect your pig.
firmament.config.auto-completions.warp-c: Auto complete warp destinations in chat. This may include warps you have not yet unlocked.
firmament.config.auto-completions.warp-i: Redirects /warp is to /warp island, since hypixel does not recognize /warp is as a warp destination.
firmament.config.bonemerang-overlay.bone: Shows how many targets your bonemerang will hit
Display an overlay that tells you what block you will warp to.
firmament.config.bonemerang-overlay.high: Highlight entities that will be hit
firmament.config.carnival.bombs-solver.d: Display bombs surrounding each block in minesweeper.
firmament.config.carnival.tutorials.desc: Show a tutorial hint every time you start a game with a Firmament tutorial.
firmament.config.category.dev.descriptio: Settings for texture pack devs and programmers
firmament.config.category.events.descrip: Settings for temporary or repeating events
firmament.config.category.garden.descrip: Features for the No. 1 Macro Free Island on SkyBlock
firmament.config.category.integrations.d: Integrations with other mods, as well as texture packs
firmament.config.category.inventory.desc: Features for anything that happens in a chest or inventory
firmament.config.category.meta.descripti: Settings for Firmament and the item repo
firmament.config.category.misc.descripti: Miscellaneous features that don't fit elsewhere
firmament.config.centuryraffle.highlight: Highlight the players you can feed while holding a Slice of Century Cake
firmament.config.chat-links.allow-all-ho: Allow displaying images no matter where it is hosted.
firmament.config.chat-links.allowed-host: Prevent yourself from requesting images from other servers, to prevent your IP from being leaked.
firmament.config.chat-links.image-enable: Show a preview of images when hovering over links in chat
firmament.config.chat-links.position.des: Edit where the images are shown
firmament.config.commissions.highlight-c: Highlight completed commissions in the commission menu
firmament.config.compatibility.explosion: Redirect explosion particles to be rendered by enhanced explosions.
Choose how big explosions will be rendered by enhanced explosions
firmament.config.composter.no-more-noise: Muffle all noises and sounds made by the composter
firmament.config.configconfig.enable-mou: Uses the MoulConfig config UI. Turn off to fall back to the built in config.
firmament.config.configconfig.enable-yac: Uses the YACL config UI. Turn off to fall back to the built in config. Needs YACL to be installed separately.
firmament.config.configconfig.wide-moulc: Use a wider editor for MoulConfig
firmament.config.copy-chat.copy-chat.des: Right click a message to copy
firmament.config.custom-skyblock-texture: Allows texture pack authors to re-texture (but not re-model) SkyBlock armors.
Allows texture pack authors replacing block models depending on block position and SkyBlock island.
How long texture models should be cached for.
Disables clearing the cache entirely. Since you will be sent new item stacks from the server if something changes, this should not cause issues.
Allow replacing items for texture packs. Turning this off does not disable custom predicates
Allow CIT resewn texture packs written for 1.20.4 to be loaded on newer versions.
Allow texture packs to load textures from some legacy paths. I.e.: Allows loading 1.21.0 armor textures on 1.21.4.
Enable Firmament's model predicates. This will apply to vanilla models as well, if that vanilla model has Firmament predicates.
Allows texture packs to recolor UI texts.
Allows texture packs to move UI elements like slots around, as well as replace the background of screens.
Allow replacing the textures of placed skulls.
firmament.config.developer-capes.show-ca: Allows you to see the developer capes.
Executes ./gradlew processResources before F3+T is executed.
firmament.config.diana.ancestral-spade.d: Automatically guess your next burrow based on particles and sounds spawned from the Ancestral Spade's Echo ability.
firmament.config.diana.ancestral-telepor: Click to teleport near the guessed burrow.
firmament.config.etherwarp-overlay.cube-: Choose the colour of the etherwarp target block.
Displays a full cube on the block
firmament.config.etherwarp-overlay.ether: Display an overlay that tells you what block you will warp to.
firmament.config.etherwarp-overlay.only-: Displays the Etherwarp overlay only while sneaking.
firmament.config.etherwarp-overlay.wiref: Displays a full outline on the block
firmament.config.fairy-souls.reset.descr: Reset all collected fairy souls, allowing you to restart from null.
firmament.config.fairy-souls.show.descri: Show unclaimed Fairy Soul waypoints in the world you are currently in.
firmament.config.fishing-warning.display: Display a warning when you are about to hook a fish
firmament.config.fixes.auto-sprint-hud.d: Show your current sprint state on your screen. Only visible if no auto sprint keybind is set.
firmament.config.fixes.auto-sprint-keybi: Toggle auto sprint via this keybinding.
firmament.config.fixes.auto-sprint-under: Also Toggle Sprint under water. Sprinting under water puts you in the swimming animation which changes your camera and hitbox, which can be confusing if you stop and start moving a lot.
firmament.config.fixes.auto-sprint.descr: This is different from vanilla sprint in the way that it only marks the keybinding pressed for the first tick of walking.
Disable the damage screen shake animation.
Hide Potion effects on the right side of your player inventory.
firmament.config.fixes.hide-potion-effec: Hides the potion effects HUD in the top right.
Remove the recipe book from your inventory
firmament.config.fixes.hide-slot-highlig: Hide slot highlights for items with disabled tooltip. This makes /sbmenu look nicer with smooth texture packs.
firmament.config.fixes.peek-chat.descrip: Hold this keybinding to view the chat as if you have it opened, but while still being able to control your character.
firmament.config.fixes.player-skins.desc: Mark all player skins as signed, preventing console spam, and some rendering issues.
firmament.config.inventory-buttons-confi: Hovering over inventory buttons will show the command they run.
Only shows buttons while in the inventory
Click anywhere to create a new inventory button or to edit one. Hold SHIFT to grid align.
firmament.config.item-hotkeys.global-tra: Press this button to search the hovered item on the bazaar or auction house.
firmament.config.item-rarity-cosmetics.b: Show item rarity background in the hotbar.
Show a background behind each item, depending on its rarity.
firmament.config.jade-integration.blocks: Show custom block descriptions and hardness levels in Jade.
firmament.config.jade-integration.progre: Show the custom mining progress in Jade, when in a world with mining fatigue.
firmament.config.lore-timers.format.desc: Choose the time format in which resolved timers are displayed.
firmament.config.lore-timers.show-creati: Shows the creation or craft timestamp of the item. Sometimes this timestamp is retained when upgrading an item, so it isn't necessarily the craft time of this specific item, but rather one of its components.
firmament.config.lore-timers.show.descri: Shows when a timer in a lore (such as interest, auction duration) would end.
firmament.config.party-commands.cooldown: Prevent people from spamming commands with a delay between party commands.
firmament.config.party-commands.enable.d: Allow people in your party to use commands like !warp, !coords, !ptme and so on. See /firm partycommands for a list
firmament.config.party-commands.ignore-o: Prevent your own messages from triggering party commands
firmament.config.pets.highlight-pet.desc: Highlight your currently selected pet in the /pets menu.
firmament.config.pets.pet-overlay-hud.de: A HUD showing current active pet and the pet exp.
firmament.config.pets.pet-overlay.descri: Shows current active pet and pet exp on screen.
firmament.config.pickaxe-info.ability-co: Shows a toast when your pickaxe ability is ready.
Show a cooldown on your cross-hair for your pickaxe ability.
firmament.config.pickaxe-info.ability-sc: Resize the cooldown around your cross-hair for your pickaxe ability.
firmament.config.pickaxe-info.block-on-d: Block pickaxe abilities on private islands by preventing you from right clicking.
firmament.config.pickaxe-info.fuel-bar.d: Replace the item durability bar of your drills with one that shows the remaining fuel.
firmament.config.power-user.copy-item-id: Press this button to copy the NEU repo SkyBlock id. This is not the raw id, but instead contains some extra transformations for things like runes, pets and enchant books.
firmament.config.power-user.copy-item-st: Copy the entire item stack metadata. This can be used in tests to recreate the item in code.
firmament.config.power-user.copy-lore.de: Copy the items name and lore as json encoded text
firmament.config.power-user.copy-nbt-dat: Copy only the ExtraAttributes, so the hypixel specific item data.
firmament.config.power-user.copy-skull-t: Copy the texture location that can be used to re-texture the skull under your cross-hair.
firmament.config.power-user.copy-texture: Copy the texture pack id that is used for the item stack under your cursor.
firmament.config.power-user.dont-highlig: Removes the highlight from items that contain a semicolon e.g Pets or Enchanted Books.
Print out information about the entity under your cross-hair.
firmament.config.power-user.export-item-: Exports the hovered item to the repo data folder
firmament.config.power-user.export-npc-l: Export the NPC's location to the repo data
firmament.config.power-user.export-recip: Export Recipe Data to the repo data
firmament.config.power-user.highlight-no: Highlights items that don't exist in the repo.
firmament.config.power-user.show-item-id: Show the SkyBlock id of items underneath them.
firmament.config.price-data.avg-lowest-b: Select if and for how long the AVG Lowest BIN should show.
firmament.config.price-data.enable-alway: Show item auction/bazaar prices on SkyBlock items
firmament.config.price-data.enable-keybi: Only show auction/bazaar prices when holding this keybinding. Unbind to always show.
firmament.config.price-data.stack-size-k: Press this key while hovering over an item to show its price multiplied by the number of items you have.
firmament.config.pristine-profit.fine-ge: Use the (more stable) price of fine gemstones, instead of flawed gemstones.
firmament.config.pristine-profit.positio: Edit the pristine profit hud location.
firmament.config.pristine-profit.timeout: Track the profit you make from pristine gemstones while mining. Set to 0 seconds to disable the HUD.
firmament.config.quick-commands.dh.descr: Warps you to the dungeon hub.
firmament.config.quick-commands.join.des: Join various types of instances like dungeons using short hands like /join f1, /join k1, /join m7
firmament.config.repo.autoUpdate.descrip: Automatically download new items for the item list on every startup.
firmament.config.repo.branch.description: Git Branch to pull item data from.
firmament.config.repo.disable-item-group: Disabling item groups can increase performance, but will no longer collect similar items (like minions, enchantments) together.
firmament.config.repo.enable-rei.descrip: REI is required for viewing Firmaments item list. If you want to use another item list provider like SkyBlockers, you can turn it off here. Without other mods this will make you revert back to the vanilla item list.
firmament.config.repo.enable-super-craft: Always use super craft when clicking the craft button in REI, instead of just when holding shift.
firmament.config.repo.perfect-renders.de: Speed up item list loading by allowing items to be loaded in partially incorrectly at first. They will be corrected down the line when the background reload completes.
firmament.config.repo.redownload.descrip: Force re-download the item list. This is automatically done on restart.
firmament.config.repo.reload.description: Force reload the item list. This will not download the item list again.
firmament.config.repo.reponame.descripti: The GitHub repository name to pull item data from.
firmament.config.repo.username.descripti: The GitHub repository organization to pull item data from.
firmament.config.repo.warn-for-missing-i: Warn if there is no compatible item list mod, like REI, installed.
firmament.config.save-cursor-position.en: Save your cursor position when switching GUIs.
firmament.config.save-cursor-position.to: Select how long your cursor position last between GUIs before resetting back to the middle of the screen.
firmament.config.slot-locking.bind-rende: Disable rendering of the slot binding lines (or all of the slot binding rendering), unless the relevant slot is being hovered.
firmament.config.slot-locking.bind.descr: Bind a hotbar slot to another slot. This allows quick switching between the slots by shift clicking on either slot.
firmament.config.slot-locking.drop-in-du: Allow dropping items in dungeons, to use your dungeon ultimate abilities.
firmament.config.slot-locking.hunting-bo: The Hunting Box frequently changes its UUID, and as such cannot be reliably protected using UUID locking. Instead this option can be used to block from dropping any Hunting Box.
Lock a SkyBlock item by it's UUID. This blocks a specific item from being dropped/sold, but still allows moving it around.
firmament.config.slot-locking.lock.descr: Lock a slot, preventing any item from being moved from, dropped from, or placed into this slot.
firmament.config.slot-locking.multi-bind: Allow binding the same hotbar slot to multiple inventory slots.
firmament.config.slot-locking.require-qu: If turned off, allows to switch between bound slots without holding shift.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.always-: Always replace the ender chest with Firmament's storage overlay.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.block-i: Disables scrolling the storage overlay screen while you are hovering over an item. Useful if you have a tooltip scrolling mod.
The height of the scrollable storage panel.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.highlig: Change the colour of the highlighted search result.
Highlight the search results in the ender chest overlay.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.inverse: Invert the mouse wheel scrolling in Firmament's storage overlay.
Margin inside of the storage overview.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.outline: Change the colour of the border around your selected storage page.
Put a border around the selected storage page in the storage overlay.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.padding: Padding inside of the storage overview.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.retain-: Retain scroll position when closing storage overlay and overview.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.rows.de: Max columns used by the storage overlay and overview.
firmament.config.storage-overlay.scroll-: Scroll speed inside of the storage overlay and overview.
firmament.config.wardrobe-keybinds.slot-: Keybind to toggle the first set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the second set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the third set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the fourth set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the fifth set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the sixth set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the seventh set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the eighth set in your wardrobe
Keybind to toggle the ninth set in your wardrobe
firmament.config.wardrobe-keybinds.wardr: Lets you use your number keys to quickly change your wardrobe
firmament.config.waypoints.reset-order-o: Resets Ordered Waypoint progress after swapping to another world.
firmament.config.waypoints.show-index.de: Show the number of an ordered waypoint in the world.
firmament.config.waypoints.skip-to-neare: Allow skipping waypoints in an ordered list. If disabled you will need to walk to the next point, before being allowed to the next one after.
firmament.config.waypoints.temp-waypoint: Display waypoints sent by other players using /firm sendcoords in the world.
firmament.hotmpreset.copied: Collected all HOTM perks to clipboard. Use /firm importhotm to import.
firmament.hotmpreset.failedimport: Could not find a HOTM perk preset in your clipboard. You can export your current HOTM perks with /firm exporthotm
firmament.hotmpreset.scrolled: Just scrolled. Waiting on server to update items.
firmament.hotmpreset.scrollprompt: We need to scroll! Please click anywhere to continue.
firmament.inventory-buttons.delete: Hold L-CTRL and click to delete
firmament.inventory-buttons.import-faile: One of your buttons could only be imported partially
firmament.poweruser.entity.name: Entity Name: %s
firmament.quick-commands.join.explain: Join a dungeon or kuudra floor by using commands like /join f1, /join m7, /join fe or /join khot
firmament.recipe.mobs.name: §8[§7Lv %d§8] §c%s
firmament.recipe.novanilla: Hypixel cannot super craft vanilla recipes
firmament.reiwarning: Firmament needs RoughlyEnoughItems to display its item list!
firmament.reiwarning.disable: Click here to disable this warning
firmament.reiwarning.disabled: Disabled the RoughlyEnoughItems warning. Keep in mind that you will not have an item list without REI.
firmament.repo.reload.disk: Reloading repository from disk. This may lag a bit.
firmament.warp-util.clear-excluded: Marked all /warp commands as potentially available.
firmament.warp-util.mark-excluded: Firmament: Tried to warp to %s, but it was not unlocked. I will avoid warping there again.
firmament.warp-util.no-warp-found: Could not find an unlocked warp in %s
zzzzzzzzz.lastentry: Here so every real firmament entry has a trailing ,
